law.text: Except as otherwise provided in KRS 230.779(7), the operator of a hub shall not be subject to any fee or tax imposed on racetracks or simulcast facilities under KRS 137.170, 138.480, 138.510, or Chapter 230 for the hub operator's wagering and simulcast operations established under KRS 230.775 to 230.785.
law.history: Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 173, sec. 5, effective July 13, 2004.
